channel.title: Project Unique! Needing An Experienced Coder ASAP!
channel.description:
Welcome to my thread :) my name is matt, and im here to make a Ultimate Runescape Private Server developing team! and we will strive to become the ultimate best!!
im currently finishing highschool, and FINISHED exam's at the moment, i am wanting this project to take off, be successful, and make a name for it's, i don't want the server put together sloppy, and not done properly, if it's gonna be done, do it right. only post down below or adding me on msn if your serious, and want to help me, help the community and give what they want :)
My Server is a PI server, with abit of coding done to it already!, im here because i can't manage a full server on my own so i will need my own developing team! the server will be 27/7- yes its called Overloadx atm, yes it WAS a server, name is changed![ just not the small detailed jframes ect.] yes a leech, but i gotta give credits to alex, ashton and chris for giving me approval. <3 [coders [ 1/3 - not including me. i do a bit of coding when i can] , and a website designer [1/1] gfx designer [1/1],
GOAS : -make this server a top server out there -make this server with a much learning possibility's with the coders -updating the gfx, with the 508 + maps, ect. -letting people have fun -adding a whole heap of new monsters -adding a whole heap of new weapons/armors -adding a whole heap of new mini-games -webclient [FINISHED !!] -Plan on having 1 update per week -reliable staff, and owner [me, ill be on helping as i can] -more to come.
Goals added already: -Web client ready -Forums [ 80% completion] -PvP point system -Fully working skills + zone -Fully working items + correct stats. stances -Fully working donator chest + zone -Fully working yell [reg players 30 seconds] -Fully fixed memleaks -Fully fixed dupes, and glitches [from what i know] -Fully working shops + prices -Fully working commands -PLUS A WHOLE HEAP MORE,
i need a - - a coder - a GFX designer/ video editor! i am hosting at the moment, if you would like to apply to one of these positions, please fill in
for coder - how long have you coded rsps's for? age? are you quick and flawless [as can be] at coding? are you reliable?hours are you on a day? work you have done previously [and state] other server's you previously worked on [and state]when can you start if accepted? other: [state]
for GFX designer - how long have you made banners/GFX designed things? age? previous work? how long been doing it for? reliable?how many hours a day are you on? other:
you need to have msn, or skype and teamviewer, ready for the job rewards from the jobs, will be discussed over msn for both of us to fully understand, and act-knowledge what needs to be done ect...
my msn is liverpool_matty1994@hotmail.com - please add me for any additional information :)
spoils of server [ ONLY A FEW !! :D hehehe][color=green]server Sever is fully functional, with alot of added benifits! alot more has been changed, and re-coded for maximum perfection, if you wanna see more of the server just add my msn, and ill be happy to show u around!! so please don't flame, to what i have done, and haven't done, just keep it to you're self unless u got useful information to give me thanks in advance :) [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/wwhncp.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/65sava.png[/img] sorry for this crop, :( [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/swpawm.jpg[/img]

item.title: Project Unique! Needing An Experienced Coder ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @holmzy holmzy
item.description:
@holmzy wrote:

Welcome to my thread my name is matt, and im here to make a Ultimate Runescape Private Server developing team! and we will strive to become the ultimate best!!

im currently finishing highschool, and FINISHED exam’s at the moment,
i am wanting this project to take off, be successful, and make a name for it’s, i don’t want the server put together sloppy, and not done properly, if it’s gonna be done, do it right.
only post down below or adding me on msn if your serious, and want to help me, help the community and give what they want

My Server is a PI server, with abit of coding done to it already!, im here because i can’t manage a full server on my own so i will need my own developing team! the server will be 27/7- yes its called Overloadx atm, yes it WAS a server, name is changed![ just not the small detailed jframes ect.] yes a leech, but i gotta give credits to alex, ashton and chris for giving me approval. <3
[coders [ 1/3 - not including me. i do a bit of coding when i can] , and a website designer [1/1] gfx designer [1/1],

GOAS :
-make this server a top server out there
-make this server with a much learning possibility’s with the coders
-updating the gfx, with the 508 + maps, ect.
-letting people have fun
-adding a whole heap of new monsters
-adding a whole heap of new weapons/armors
-adding a whole heap of new mini-games
-webclient [FINISHED !!]
-Plan on having 1 update per week
-reliable staff, and owner [me, ill be on helping as i can]
-more to come.

Goals added already:
-Web client ready
-Forums [ 80% completion]
-PvP point system
-Fully working skills + zone
-Fully working items + correct stats. stances
-Fully working donator chest + zone
-Fully working yell [reg players 30 seconds]
-Fully fixed memleaks
-Fully fixed dupes, and glitches [from what i know]
-Fully working shops + prices
-Fully working commands
-PLUS A WHOLE HEAP MORE,

i need a -

  • a coder
  • a GFX designer/ video editor!
    i am hosting at the moment,
    if you would like to apply to one of these positions, please fill in

for coder -
how long have you coded rsps’s for?
age?
are you quick and flawless [as can be] at coding?
are you reliable?hours are you on a day?
work you have done previously [and state]
other server’s you previously worked on [and state]when can you start if accepted?
other: [state]

for GFX designer -
how long have you made banners/GFX designed things?
age?
previous work?
how long been doing it for?
reliable?how many hours a day are you on?
other:

you need to have msn, or skype and teamviewer, ready for the job
rewards from the jobs, will be discussed over msn for both of us to fully understand, and act-knowledge what needs to be done ect…

my msn is liverpool_matty1994@hotmail.com - please add me for any additional information

spoils of server [ ONLY A FEW !! hehehe][color=green]server Sever is fully functional, with alot of added benifits! alot more has been changed, and re-coded for maximum perfection, if you wanna see more of the server just add my msn, and ill be happy to show u around!! so please don’t flame, to what i have done, and haven’t done, just keep it to you’re self unless u got useful information to give me thanks in advance
